name: SeX Games
description:
SeX Games is simple project containing multiple mini games created for live cam models that are using chat systems that do not have built in games. To use this in chat, you will need a second monitor with adequate lighting so it can be displayed on your webcam or by using picture in picture. It's very easy to use and completely dynamic. The escape key also toggles in and out of fullscreen

Minigames include:

Prize Wheel

Randomizer (Almost like dice)

Slot Machine

If there is any requests for features or minigames I'd love to hear them in the comment section below
